interface.name: Transforms
interface.comment:
Adds a <code>ds:Transform<code> to the list of transforms.
@param transform.
interface.javadoc:
A container for ds:Transforms.

It is defined as follows:

<complexType name='TransformsType'> <sequence> <element ref='ds:Transform' maxOccurs='unbounded'/> </sequence> </complexType> Axl Mattheus com.sun.org.apache.xml.internal.security.encryption.CipherReference

Temporary method to turn the XMLEncryption Transforms class into a DS class. The main logic is currently implemented in the DS class, so we need to get to get the base class.

Note This will be removed in future versions
